attributes.action: seek an urgent review of the decision by the NMC to strike off Margret Hayward
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Margaret Haywood a nurse who secretly filmed the neglect of elderly hospital patients has been struck off for misconduct. However Ms Haywood has the overwhelming support of the public who view her actions as being in the public interest and a miscarriage of natural justice. The undersigned ask the PM to urgently investigate the issue and restore Ms Haywood's status as a nurse.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
